alert.note: Alert for Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 10 at 5:17AM MST until March 10 at 7:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Higher terrain of the New Mexico Bootheel in far southwest New Mexico * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will make driving hazardous. The strong winds will also create areas of blowing dust which will cause quickly changing visibilities Wild fire danger will be elevated.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
